trans-unit.source: Represents a control that provides a scroll bar that has a sliding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> whose position corresponds to a value.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en kontroll som innehåller en rullningslist som har ett glidande <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> vars läge motsvarar ett värde.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ScrollBar control.
trans-unit.target: Följande bild visar en rullningslist.

trans-unit.source: ![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") The ScrollBar control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: ![Rullningslisten bild](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "rullningslisten bild") i rullningslisten kontrollen innehåller en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control consists of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontroll består av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>kontroll och två <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: You can increase and decrease the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the ScrollBar control by pressing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls or by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan öka och minska den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>egenskapen för rullningslist genom att trycka på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>kontroller eller genom att flytta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default range of values for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property is from 0 to 1.
trans-unit.target: Standard-värdeintervall för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>egenskapen är från 0 till 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> represents the linear distance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> between the endpoints of the ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>representerar linjär avståndet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>mellan slutpunkter i rullningslisten.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the default range of values by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra standard värdeintervallet genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A> property determines whether the ScrollBar is displayed horizontally or vertically, and you must define this property for the ScrollBar control to appear.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>egenskapen avgör om rullningslisten visas vågrätt eller lodrätt, och du måste ange den här egenskapen för rullningslisten kontrollen ska visas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a ScrollBar is oriented so that values increase from top to bottom for a vertical ScrollBar or from left to right for a horizontal ScrollBar.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>i en rullningslist är placerad så att värden ökar uppifrån och ned för lodräta rullningslisten eller från vänster till höger för en vågräta rullningslist.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties in the following table are the binding targets for the corresponding ScrollBar properties when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property is not explicitly defined.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>Egenskaper i följande tabell är bindning mål för motsvarande rullningslisten egenskaper när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>egenskapen inte uttryckligen definieras.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: If you explicitly define the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property, the binding does not occur.
trans-unit.target: Om du uttryckligen definierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>egenskapen bindningen sker inte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property|ScrollBar property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control of a ScrollBar control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>| Rullningslistegenskapen | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Du kan komma åt den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontroll över en rullningslist med hjälp av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Track%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: To display <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> content inside a box that has scroll bars, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: Visa <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>innehåll i en ruta som har rullningslister använder den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollBar Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollBar controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Anpassa den rullningslisten kontrollen att använda samma egenskapsinställningar för flera rullningslisten kontroller, Använd den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>att ge unik för kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollBar, see [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Delar och tillstånd som är specifika för rullningslisten finns [rullningslisten format och mallar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Beroendeegenskaper för den här kontrollen kan ställas in av kontrollens standardformat.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Om en egenskapen anges av ett standardformat kan egenskapen ändras från standardvärdet när kontrollen visas i programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardformatet som bestäms av vilka tema används när programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [standard WPF teman](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollBar control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual egenskapen endast har betydelse om egenskapen är båda finns i rullningslisten kontrollens standardmall och anges genom att använda en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du hittar en lista över visuella egenskaper i avsnittet "Ändra Visual struktur för ett Control" i [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that the user is dragging the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of the horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> to the value that is provided in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.
trans-unit.target: Det kommando som meddelar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> som användaren drar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> av vågrätt <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> till det värde som har angetts i <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand.
trans-unit.target: När användaren drar skjutreglaget för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>anrop <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>för DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>returnerar `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Kör kommandot.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>returnerar `false`, som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>körs i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses this command to enable deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>använder det här kommandot för att aktivera bläddring uppskjutna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true` and a user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> does not change until the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: När <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>är `true` och en användare drar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>innehållet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>inte ändras förrän användaren släpper <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If deferred scrolling is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand for a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Om uppskjutna bläddring är aktiverat, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Kör DeferScrollToHorizontalOffsetCommand för en vågräta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>när användaren drar i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: The command that notifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that the user is dragging the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> of the vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> to the value that is provided in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.
trans-unit.target: Det kommando som meddelar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> som användaren drar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> av vertikalt <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> till det värde som har angetts i <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter*>

trans-unit.source: When the user drags the thumb of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> for the DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand.
trans-unit.target: När användaren drar skjutreglaget för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>anrop <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>för DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes that command.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>returnerar `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Kör kommandot.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> returns `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>returnerar `false`, som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>körs i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses this command to enable deferred scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>använder det här kommandot för att aktivera bläddring uppskjutna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true` and a user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> does not change until the user releases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: När <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>är `true` och en användare drar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>innehållet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>inte ändras förrän användaren släpper <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If deferred scrolling is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> executes the DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.
trans-unit.target: Om uppskjutna bläddring är aktiverat, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Kör DeferScrollToVerticalOffsetCommand för en lodrät <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>när användaren drar i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> är aktiverad.

trans-unit.source: This implementation sets IsEnabledCore to `true` only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen anger IsEnabledCore till `true` bara om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>är större än den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>värde och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>är aktiverat.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> is enabled in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> and the size of the content is larger than the display area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> är aktiverat i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> och storleken på innehållet som är större än visningsområdet, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The command that scrolls a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> by a small amount in the vertical direction of increasing value of its <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kommandot som rullar en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> något i den lodräta riktningen för att öka värdet för dess <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This command increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Det här kommandot ökar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>med värdet den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This command occurs when the user presses the DOWN ARROW key.
trans-unit.target: Det här kommandot inträffar när användaren trycker på nedpilen.

trans-unit.source: When you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> executes this command.
trans-unit.target: När du implementerar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>som en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>styra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>Kör det här kommandot.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage `<` *object* *property*`="`**ScrollBar.LineDownCommand**`"/>`

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> för en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: A typical style template for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control includes a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is surrounded on either side by two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> controls.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig formatmall för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontrollen innehåller en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontroll som omges på endera sidan av två <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> that is used with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> som används med en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger mängden rullningsbara innehåll som är synliga.

trans-unit.source: The units that are used for ViewportSize are the same units that are used to describe the length of the content.
trans-unit.target: Enheter som används för ViewportSize är samma enheter som används för att beskriva längden på innehållet.

trans-unit.source: Some examples include lines of text or pages of text.
trans-unit.target: Några exempel på rader med text eller sidor med text.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control that is displayed as the sliding value indicator in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Värdet på egenskapen ViewportSize används för att beräkna storleken på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>kontroll som visas som indikatorn glidande värde i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control's size represents the amount of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>kontrollens storlek representerar det en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontrollens innehåll som är synligt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If 25 percent of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control's content is visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> occupies 25 percent of the track in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Om 25 procent av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontrollens innehåll visas <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>upptar 25 procent för track i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: You can decide which units ViewportSize uses.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bestämma vilka enheter ViewportSize använder.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, make sure that the ViewportSize, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties use the same units.
trans-unit.target: När du ställer in den här egenskapen gör ViewportSize, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>Egenskaper använda samma enhet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> size reflects the amount of content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: I följande illustration visas hur <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>storlek visar mängden innehåll som är synligt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: ![The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "The track length and thumbsize of a ScrollBar") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![Spåra längd och thumbsize av en rullningslist](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsize.png "spåra längd och thumbsize av en rullningslist") ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The amount of the scrollable content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Mängden rullningsbara innehåll som är synliga.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 0.
